data.code:
try:
    import os
    
    # Create project directory
    os.makedirs('project', exist_ok=True)
    
    # Verify directory creation
    assert os.path.exists('project'), "Directory was not created"
    assert os.path.isdir('project'), "Path exists but is not a directory"
    print("任务完成")
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f"发生错误: {str(e)}")
